episodes.title: The Narcosatanists Adolfo Constanzo & Sara Maria Aldrete
episodes.description:
This is a short documentary in regards to a group of religious cult members led by an individual named Adolfo Constanzo, who sacrificed humans for protection from the law enforcement. 

They believed that by making people suffer a painful death and use their body parts to sacrifice the cult members will be immune to prosecution. However, in their activities of human sacrifices they abducted a student from an American University who went by the name Mark Kilroy and things changed from there on, for Mark was a well connected student and him missing triggered authorities to search for him intently so.

 Rewards were offered so that he could be found and he was eventually found however, he had already been killed and his body parts used for sacrificial ceremonies by the cult members of Palo Mayombe led by Adolfo Constanzo. 

Adolfo met his demise through the order he gave to one of his cult members El Duby when the police had closed in on their hideout and died in the apartment and the remaining trio which included Sara Maria Aldrete were apprehended and were charged and sentenced to different terms in terms of each individual charges.
